name: rflow
description: Flow-like runtime type-checking with native JavaScript types.
author: Laurent Payot

scripts.test: npm run build && npm run minify && npm run build-tests && mocha
scripts.link: npm run test && cp package.json dist && cp *.md dist && cd dist && npm link
scripts.publish: npm run test && cp package.json dist && cp *.md dist && cd dist && npm publish
